languages.text: "П-помилуйте! Мы преосведомлены о положении дел и о смертопредставлении негоднейшего капитана Саргоны... Не рискнем и мыслепокуситься на священную подать!"
"P-please! We are overacquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute. Never!"
languages.original_text: "П-помилуйте! Мы преосведомлены о положении дел и о смертопредставлении негоднейшего капитана Саргоны... Не рискнем и мыслепокуситься на священную подать!"

traits.locale_text: "P-please! We are overacquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute, never!"
"P-please! We are overacquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute, never!"
"P-please! We are well acquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute. Never!"
"P-please! We are well acquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute. Never!"
"P-please! We are overacquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute. Never!"
"P-please! We are overacquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute. Never!"

languages.text: “饶……饶命！我们对这边的规矩了如指甲，也知道那个胆大恶为的萨戈纳船长落得了什么下场。我们绝对不会，也绝对不敢妄使侵占神圣的什一税！绝对不敢！”
languages.original_text: "P-please! We are overacquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute. Never!"

traits.locale_text: “饶……饶命！我们对这边的规矩了如指甲，也知道那个胆大恶为的萨戈纳船长落得了什么下场。我们绝对不会，也绝对不敢妄使侵占神圣的什一税！绝对不敢！”
“饶……饶命！我们很熟悉这边的规矩，也知道那个胆大恶为的萨戈纳船长落得了什么下场。我们绝对不会，也绝对不敢妄使侵占神圣的什一税！绝对不敢！”

languages.text: «Po... ¡por favor! Conocemos demasiado bien cómo funcionan las cosas y el final del deshonroso capitán Sargona. ¡Nunca se nos ocurriría ni acercarnos al sagrado diezmo! ¡Jamás de los jamases!».
languages.original_text: "P-please! We are overacquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute. Never!"

traits.locale_text: «Po... ¡por favor! Conocemos demasiado bien cómo funcionan las cosas y el final del deshonroso capitán Sargona. ¡Nunca se nos ocurriría ni acercarnos al sagrado diezmo! ¡Jamás de los jamases!».

languages.text: « P-pitié... On sait comment ça se passe, et on est bien au courant de comment l'horrible capitaine Sargona a été exécutionnée. On n'oserait jamais tenter de s'appropriationner un tribut sacré. Jamais ! »
languages.original_text: "P-please! We are overacquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute. Never!"

traits.locale_text: « P-pitié... On sait comment ça se passe, et on est bien au courant de comment l'horrible capitaine Sargona a été exécutionnée. On n'oserait jamais tenter de s'appropriationner un tribut sacré. Jamais ! »

languages.text: 「お、お願いです！私たちはこの惑星のあり方も、あの不名誉なキャプテン・サルゴナの死についても、十分すぎるほど存じております。ですから、決して、決して聖なる租税に手を出すなどとは思いもよりませんでした。絶対に！」
languages.original_text: "P-please! We are overacquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute. Never!"

traits.locale_text: 「お、お願いです！私たちはこの惑星のあり方も、あの不名誉なキャプテン・サルゴナの死についても、十分すぎるほど存じております。ですから、決して、決して聖なる租税に手を出すなどとは思いもよりませんでした。絶対に！」

languages.text: "Lütfen durun! İşlerin nasıl yürüdüğünü ve en onursuz Kaptan Sargona'nın vefatını çok iyi biliyoruz. O kutsal aşar bölgesine asla ama asla leke sürmeyi düşünmeyiz. Asla!"
languages.original_text: "P-please! We are overacquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute. Never!"

traits.locale_text: "Lütfen durun! İşlerin nasıl yürüdüğünü ve en onursuz Kaptan Sargona'nın vefatını çok iyi biliyoruz. O kutsal aşar bölgesine asla ama asla leke sürmeyi düşünmeyiz. Asla!"

languages.text: "B-Bitte! Wir sind maximal vertraut mit den Regeln und dem Verscheiden des höchst ehrlosen Captain Sargona. Wir würden niemals, also niemals wagen, den heiligen Tribut anzufassen. Niemals!"
languages.original_text: "P-please! We are overacquainted with the way of things and with the expassing of the most dishonourable Captain Sargona. We would never, never think to encroach upon the sacred tribute. Never!"

traits.locale_text: "B-Bitte! Wir sind maximal vertraut mit den Regeln und dem Verscheiden des höchst ehrlosen Captain Sargona. Wir würden niemals, also niemals wagen, den heiligen Tribut anzufassen. Niemals!"
